{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Assistant",
  "description": "Global Peace Development (GPD) is a Non-Governmental Organization (NGO) founded in April 2002 and focuses on promoting peace for development in Nigeria. The organization envisions a country where peace and development is enjoyed by all. GPD seeks to build peace, gender equality, social justice, and foster democracy and governance at the community, local, state, and national levels.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant
Job Location:&nbsp;Kaduna
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	The Admin assistant will be responsible for managing office facilities, making provision for travel and accommodation arrangements for management staff and consultants of the organization, and maintaining office premises.
	She will support the day-to-day running of the office to ensure smooth running.


Major Roles and Responsibilities


	Support employee recruitment and performance appraisal processes.
	Prepare and disseminate reports of the Organization&rsquo;s staff technical and general meetings.
	Procure office supplies and ensure timely payment of office utility bills.
	Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
	Preparing travel arrangements for office staff and managers.
	Track staff attendance and movement through registers.
	Develop monthly track sheets of staff lateness rate.
	Facilitate all logistics arrangements for meetings.
	Manage office phone lines and record correspondence.
	Receive, document, and track deliveries from vendors.


Requirements


	ND /&nbsp;NCE qualification in Business Administration, Office Technology and Management, or a related field of study.
	At least 2 years of work experience, 1 of which must be professional experience in administrative roles.
	Proven ability to provide a high level of support to the management team.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter in one document to:&nbsp;procurement@globalpeacedev.org&nbsp;using &quot;Admin Assistant &ndash; Kaduna State&quot;&nbsp;as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Only qualified and shortlisted candidates will be contacted.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-04",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

  },

Administrative Assistant Job at Global Peace Development (GPD)




        
    

        
        Global Peace Development (GPD) is a Non-Governmental Organization (NGO) founded in April 2002 and focuses on promoting peace for development in Nigeria. The organization envisions a country where peace and development is enjoyed by all. GPD seeks to build peace, gender equality, social justice, and foster democracy and governance at the community, local, state, and national levels.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant
Job Location: Kaduna
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Admin assistant will be responsible for managing office facilities, making provision for travel and accommodation arrangements for management staff and consultants of the organization, and maintaining office premises.
	She will support the day-to-day running of the office to ensure smooth running.


Major Roles and Responsibilities


	Support employee recruitment and performance appraisal processes.
	Prepare and disseminate reports of the Organization’s staff technical and general meetings.
	Procure office supplies and ensure timely payment of office utility bills.
	Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
	Preparing travel arrangements for office staff and managers.
	Track staff attendance and movement through registers.
	Develop monthly track sheets of staff lateness rate.
	Facilitate all logistics arrangements for meetings.
	Manage office phone lines and record correspondence.
	Receive, document, and track deliveries from vendors.


Requirements


	ND / NCE qualification in Business Administration, Office Technology and Management, or a related field of study.
	At least 2 years of work experience, 1 of which must be professional experience in administrative roles.
	Proven ability to provide a high level of support to the management team.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter in one document to: procurement@globalpeacedev.org using "Admin Assistant – Kaduna State" as the subject of the email.

Note: Only qualified and shortlisted candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Office & Social Media Assistant",
  "description": "Oraimo is a subsidiary of&nbsp;Transsion Holdings,a Chinese company that specializes in mobile communication devices and accessories. Founded in&nbsp;2014&nbsp;and headquartered in&nbsp;Lagos, Nigeria, Oraimo aims to provide high-quality mobile accessories at affordable prices. The brand quickly gained popularity for its innovative approach, focusing on products that enhance the mobile experience for tech-savvy consumers, particularly in Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Office &amp; Social Media Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking a proactive and organized Office &amp; Social Media Assistant to support our daily administrative operations while assisting with basic social media management and occasional logistics tasks.
	This role is ideal for someone who is detail-oriented and comfortable working in a dynamic environment where responsibilities may vary day to day.


Key Responsibilities
Administrative Support:


	Assist with day-to-day office operations and general administrative tasks.


Social Media &amp; Digital Support:


	Assist in maintaining company social media pages with other team members.
	Help in creating and scheduling basic content
	Monitor social media engagement and respond to messages or comments when necessary.


Logistics &amp; Operational Support:


	Handle occasional product pick-ups and deliveries from the warehouse or partners.
	Assist with packaging, sorting, and organizing products when needed.
	Provide on-ground support during company events, pop-ups, and activations.


Preferred Skills:


	Basic graphic design or content creation tools (Canva, CapCut, etc.) is a plus.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N200,000 Monthly.
	A supportive and collaborative work environment.
	Opportunities to learn and grow in office administration, social media, and operations.
	Hands-on experience across multiple areas of the business.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;adesegun.fadekemi@oraimo.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-16",

Office & Social Media Assistant Job at Oraimo




        
    

        
        Oraimo is a subsidiary of Transsion Holdings,a Chinese company that specializes in mobile communication devices and accessories. Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Lagos, Nigeria, Oraimo aims to provide high-quality mobile accessories at affordable prices. The brand quickly gained popularity for its innovative approach, focusing on products that enhance the mobile experience for tech-savvy consumers, particularly in Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Office & Social Media Assistant

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a proactive and organized Office & Social Media Assistant to support our daily administrative operations while assisting with basic social media management and occasional logistics tasks.
	This role is ideal for someone who is detail-oriented and comfortable working in a dynamic environment where responsibilities may vary day to day.


Key Responsibilities
Administrative Support:


	Assist with day-to-day office operations and general administrative tasks.


Social Media & Digital Support:


	Assist in maintaining company social media pages with other team members.
	Help in creating and scheduling basic content
	Monitor social media engagement and respond to messages or comments when necessary.


Logistics & Operational Support:


	Handle occasional product pick-ups and deliveries from the warehouse or partners.
	Assist with packaging, sorting, and organizing products when needed.
	Provide on-ground support during company events, pop-ups, and activations.


Preferred Skills:


	Basic graphic design or content creation tools (Canva, CapCut, etc.) is a plus.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N200,000 Monthly.
	A supportive and collaborative work environment.
	Opportunities to learn and grow in office administration, social media, and operations.
	Hands-on experience across multiple areas of the business.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: adesegun.fadekemi@oraimo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Executive",
  "description": "Sterling Homes Limited is a private limited liability company incorporated in, 2010, by the Corporate Affairs Commission, Abuja, Nigeria, under the Companies and Allied Matters Act (CAMA) 1990. Our incorporation number is RC.894767.&nbsp;We are a real estate housing development, investment and allied Services Company.

We are poised to do real estate excellently, reinventing the way real estate business is managed in Africa and giving customer service delivery a new outlook. Our mission is to be one of the top ten home providers for individuals and corporate bodies in the next five years. We buy lands, finance real estate deals, build or have builders build projects, create, imagine, control and orchestrate the process of development from the beginning to the end.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive
Job Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Lead Generation:


	Identify and generate high-quality leads through research, networking, and outreach efforts.
	Utilize social media platforms to identify potential customers and engage with them.
	Collaborate with the sales team to ensure seamless follow-up on generated leads.


Social Media Management:


	Develop and implement a social media strategy to increase brand awareness and drive sales.
	Manage and maintain our social media presence across multiple platforms (e.g., LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook).
	Create and curate engaging content to attract and retain followers.
	Create a content calendar quarterly


Social Media Visibility:


	Monitor and analyze social media metrics to track engagement, reach, and lead generation.
	Develop and implement strategies to increase social media visibility and reach.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure consistent branding and messaging.
	Assist with sales presentation: Helping prepare and deliver sales presentation and demonstration.
	Developing and monitoring performance indicators for sales and staff members, managing sales tracking tools and compiling reports
	Staying up to date with the latest trends and practices


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications.


Salary
N120,000 Monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to:&nbsp;hr@sterlinghomesltd.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Business Development Executive Job at Sterling Homes Limited




        
    

        
        Sterling Homes Limited is a private limited liability company incorporated in, 2010, by the Corporate Affairs Commission, Abuja, Nigeria, under the Companies and Allied Matters Act (CAMA) 1990. Our incorporation number is RC.894767. We are a real estate housing development, investment and allied Services Company.

We are poised to do real estate excellently, reinventing the way real estate business is managed in Africa and giving customer service delivery a new outlook. Our mission is to be one of the top ten home providers for individuals and corporate bodies in the next five years. We buy lands, finance real estate deals, build or have builders build projects, create, imagine, control and orchestrate the process of development from the beginning to the end.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive
Job Location:  Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
Lead Generation:


	Identify and generate high-quality leads through research, networking, and outreach efforts.
	Utilize social media platforms to identify potential customers and engage with them.
	Collaborate with the sales team to ensure seamless follow-up on generated leads.


Social Media Management:


	Develop and implement a social media strategy to increase brand awareness and drive sales.
	Manage and maintain our social media presence across multiple platforms (e.g., LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook).
	Create and curate engaging content to attract and retain followers.
	Create a content calendar quarterly


Social Media Visibility:


	Monitor and analyze social media metrics to track engagement, reach, and lead generation.
	Develop and implement strategies to increase social media visibility and reach.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure consistent branding and messaging.
	Assist with sales presentation: Helping prepare and deliver sales presentation and demonstration.
	Developing and monitoring performance indicators for sales and staff members, managing sales tracking tools and compiling reports
	Staying up to date with the latest trends and practices


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications.


Salary
N120,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to: hr@sterlinghomesltd.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Officer (Volunteer)",
  "description": "Rec Room Wellness is a social enterprise dedicated to addressing the global mental health crisis by creating safe and brave spaces for relaxation, education, and fun.&nbsp;At our events, you will learn important topics to boost your awareness of your mental health, put words to feelings, and build resilience against the adversities of life. You will also practice self-care activities, learn new hobbies, and create connections with like-minded community members.&nbsp;We also offer wellness workshops for students and staff, longitudinal wellness cohorts, and in-person wellness events and retreats.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Administrative Officer (Volunteer)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Objective


	To provide essential coordination support to ensure smooth operations at Rec Room Wellness.
	This role focuses on keeping teams aligned, tracking assignments, and ensuring timely follow-ups, helping the organization deliver on its commitments efficiently.


Expectations


	Commitment to a minimum of 6 months, renewable.
	Approx. 10 hours per week, including check-in meetings and reporting.
	Consistent communication and timely follow-ups.
	Uphold confidentiality, professionalism, and attention to detail.


Responsibilities
Task Management &amp; Tracking:


	Compile a weekly roundup of assignments across teams.
	Follow up with Fellows, staff, and volunteers to ensure deliverables are on track.


Reporting &amp; Review:


	Meet with the Chief Operations Officer every Saturday to review deliverables and priorities.
	Provide clear status updates on pending, completed, and upcoming tasks.
	Produce a Quarterly Strategic Goals Report highlighting activities, outcomes, challenges, and priorities.


Operational Support:


	Assist in maintaining schedules, deadlines, and organizational calendars.
	Document weekly progress and highlight challenges or bottlenecks for resolution.


Communication:


	Act as a point of contact for task-related inquiries.
	Ensure clarity and alignment between different teams and the COO.


Workflow:


	Saturday &ndash; Meet with COO to report on task completion for the current week, review deliverables, and assign priorities for the upcoming week.
	Midweek &ndash; Track assignments and send reminders/follow-ups to responsible team members.
	End of Quarter&ndash; Prepare and submit the Quarterly Strategic Goals Report.
	Ongoing &ndash; Maintain a running log of tasks, deliverables, and timelines.


Tools &amp; Platforms


	Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Calendar)
	WhatsApp (team coordination)
	Task management tools (Trello, Asana, or equivalent if needed)


Requirements
Skills &amp; Qualities:


	Strong organizational and time-management skills.
	Excellent written and verbal communication.
	Ability to track multiple tasks and follow up diplomatically.
	Reliable, proactive, and detail-oriented.
	Comfortable working in a collaborative, team-based environment.


Other Requirements:


	An interest in mental wellness, service, and positive community building
	Consistency and reliability (5-10 hours weekly, depending on role)
	Good communication skills
	Openness to learning and teamwork
	Alignment with our&nbsp;IMPACT&nbsp;values


Volunteer Perks
At Rec Room Wellness, Volunteering isn&rsquo;t just about giving; it&rsquo;s also about growing. Here&rsquo;s what you gain by joining the Rec Room Wellness team:


	Exclusive Learning Sessions: Access weekly meetings for personal and professional development.
	Skill Development: Refine your skills in writing, design, marketing, event facilitation, and leadership.
	Build Your Portfolio: Work on meaningful projects you can proudly showcase.
	Networking: Connect with like-minded young adults passionate about wellness and service.
	Impact: Directly contribute to the mental well-being of young people in Nigeria.
	Support: Gain access to one free mental wellness session per month.


What you stand to gain:


	Free Wellness Sessions
	Volunteer Trainings and Retreats
	Rec Room Merch (as they become available)
	Meaningful experience to boost your CV.


Note:&nbsp;For more information or assistance email the Chief Operations Officer at:&nbsp;hello@recroomwellness.com",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-11",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",

  },

Administrative Officer (Volunteer) Job at Rec Room Wellness




        
    

        
        Rec Room Wellness is a social enterprise dedicated to addressing the global mental health crisis by creating safe and brave spaces for relaxation, education, and fun. At our events, you will learn important topics to boost your awareness of your mental health, put words to feelings, and build resilience against the adversities of life. You will also practice self-care activities, learn new hobbies, and create connections with like-minded community members. We also offer wellness workshops for students and staff, longitudinal wellness cohorts, and in-person wellness events and retreats.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer (Volunteer)

Job Location: Lagos
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Objective


	To provide essential coordination support to ensure smooth operations at Rec Room Wellness.
	This role focuses on keeping teams aligned, tracking assignments, and ensuring timely follow-ups, helping the organization deliver on its commitments efficiently.


Expectations


	Commitment to a minimum of 6 months, renewable.
	Approx. 10 hours per week, including check-in meetings and reporting.
	Consistent communication and timely follow-ups.
	Uphold confidentiality, professionalism, and attention to detail.


Responsibilities
Task Management & Tracking:


	Compile a weekly roundup of assignments across teams.
	Follow up with Fellows, staff, and volunteers to ensure deliverables are on track.


Reporting & Review:


	Meet with the Chief Operations Officer every Saturday to review deliverables and priorities.
	Provide clear status updates on pending, completed, and upcoming tasks.
	Produce a Quarterly Strategic Goals Report highlighting activities, outcomes, challenges, and priorities.


Operational Support:


	Assist in maintaining schedules, deadlines, and organizational calendars.
	Document weekly progress and highlight challenges or bottlenecks for resolution.


Communication:


	Act as a point of contact for task-related inquiries.
	Ensure clarity and alignment between different teams and the COO.


Workflow:


	Saturday – Meet with COO to report on task completion for the current week, review deliverables, and assign priorities for the upcoming week.
	Midweek – Track assignments and send reminders/follow-ups to responsible team members.
	End of Quarter– Prepare and submit the Quarterly Strategic Goals Report.
	Ongoing – Maintain a running log of tasks, deliverables, and timelines.


Tools & Platforms


	Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Calendar)
	WhatsApp (team coordination)
	Task management tools (Trello, Asana, or equivalent if needed)


Requirements
Skills & Qualities:


	Strong organizational and time-management skills.
	Excellent written and verbal communication.
	Ability to track multiple tasks and follow up diplomatically.
	Reliable, proactive, and detail-oriented.
	Comfortable working in a collaborative, team-based environment.


Other Requirements:


	An interest in mental wellness, service, and positive community building
	Consistency and reliability (5-10 hours weekly, depending on role)
	Good communication skills
	Openness to learning and teamwork
	Alignment with our IMPACT values


Volunteer Perks
At Rec Room Wellness, Volunteering isn’t just about giving; it’s also about growing. Here’s what you gain by joining the Rec Room Wellness team:


	Exclusive Learning Sessions: Access weekly meetings for personal and professional development.
	Skill Development: Refine your skills in writing, design, marketing, event facilitation, and leadership.
	Build Your Portfolio: Work on meaningful projects you can proudly showcase.
	Networking: Connect with like-minded young adults passionate about wellness and service.
	Impact: Directly contribute to the mental well-being of young people in Nigeria.
	Support: Gain access to one free mental wellness session per month.


What you stand to gain:


	Free Wellness Sessions
	Volunteer Trainings and Retreats
	Rec Room Merch (as they become available)
	Meaningful experience to boost your CV.


Note: For more information or assistance email the Chief Operations Officer at: hello@recroomwellness.com    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Strategist",
  "description": "Citimobile Media Limited is a Nigerian-based out-of-home (OOH) advertising and 360 marketing communications company. They&#39;re headquartered in Lekki Phase 1, Lagos. They specialize in bespoke OOH advertising services with innovative solutions like LED screens, gantry eye catchers, and bus branding.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Strategist
Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Work mode: Hybrid
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing strategies to achieve business goals.
	He/she will play a role in driving traffic, engagement, and conversions through various digital channels and initiatives.
	Digital strategists offer responsibilities that include developing strong lasting relationships with clients.


Roles and Responsibilities


	Proven experience in creative strategy development and content creation.
	Perform exhaustive research to gain in-depth knowledge of all customer personas.
	Monitor SEO/SEM, marketing, and sales performance metrics to forecast trends.
	Experience in managing large accounts and monitoring campaigns.
	Knowledge of Google ads, and programmatic advertising.
	Digital media planning/buying.
	Establish best practices in digital marketing
	Stay up to date with the latest technology and best practices
	Creating and monitoring digital campaigns.
	Developing creative ideas on how to engage an audience and meet clients&rsquo; business objectives.
	Develop writing style, tone, and voice for all content and ensure they are consistent across all delivery platforms.
	Generate weekly reports using analytics and graphics.


Requirements


	BSc degree in Marketing, Advertising, or a relevant field
	At least 3 - 5 years of proven work experience as a core digital marketing strategist
	Demonstrable experience with SEO/SEM
	Knowledge of Google ads, and programmatic advertising.
	Experience implementing and optimizing Google Ads campaigns.
	Solid knowledge of web analytics tools like Google Analytics.
	Hands-on experience with the creation of strategy and media buying.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Strong analytical and project management skills.
	Experience in an advertising agency will be an added advantage.
	Experience in B2B marketing is preferred.





Salary
N400,000.00 - N450,000.00 (net) per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@ad-visedigital.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-02",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-08",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Citimobile Media Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {

Digital Strategist Job at Citimobile Media Limited




        
    

        
        Citimobile Media Limited is a Nigerian-based out-of-home (OOH) advertising and 360 marketing communications company. They're headquartered in Lekki Phase 1, Lagos. They specialize in bespoke OOH advertising services with innovative solutions like LED screens, gantry eye catchers, and bus branding.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Strategist
Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Work mode: Hybrid
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing strategies to achieve business goals.
	He/she will play a role in driving traffic, engagement, and conversions through various digital channels and initiatives.
	Digital strategists offer responsibilities that include developing strong lasting relationships with clients.


Roles and Responsibilities


	Proven experience in creative strategy development and content creation.
	Perform exhaustive research to gain in-depth knowledge of all customer personas.
	Monitor SEO/SEM, marketing, and sales performance metrics to forecast trends.
	Experience in managing large accounts and monitoring campaigns.
	Knowledge of Google ads, and programmatic advertising.
	Digital media planning/buying.
	Establish best practices in digital marketing
	Stay up to date with the latest technology and best practices
	Creating and monitoring digital campaigns.
	Developing creative ideas on how to engage an audience and meet clients’ business objectives.
	Develop writing style, tone, and voice for all content and ensure they are consistent across all delivery platforms.
	Generate weekly reports using analytics and graphics.


Requirements


	BSc degree in Marketing, Advertising, or a relevant field
	At least 3 - 5 years of proven work experience as a core digital marketing strategist
	Demonstrable experience with SEO/SEM
	Knowledge of Google ads, and programmatic advertising.
	Experience implementing and optimizing Google Ads campaigns.
	Solid knowledge of web analytics tools like Google Analytics.
	Hands-on experience with the creation of strategy and media buying.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Strong analytical and project management skills.
	Experience in an advertising agency will be an added advantage.
	Experience in B2B marketing is preferred.





Salary
N400,000.00 - N450,000.00 (net) per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@ad-visedigital.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
